abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column poses series of questions one must ask about Syrian civil war before deciding whether Pres Obama has or has not done enough regarding the conflict; refutes argument advanced by Hillary Rodham Clinton that merely arming pro-democracy rebels would have led to defeat of Pres Bashar al-Assad's army.
lead_paragraph: Some important questions have gone unanswered in the Syria blame game.
